summary:
Kuswadi’s international career path began in a multinational energy company as a geologist before developing himself in various Human Resources roles covering Talent Development, Resourcing, Policy and HR Services. He enjoyed coaching and mentoring junior employees and team managers as part of his formal and informal responsibilities in the company.

In 2016, building on his 15 years of corporate experience and passion in people development, Kuswadi redirected his career focus and embarked independently as a full-time life and leadership coach. He works with culturally and professionally diverse group of international individual and corporate clients in Europe and Asia. His personal experience and familiarity with the trials and challenges associated with navigating through various career transitions naturally attracts individual coachees professionals and young leaders who wish to explore their own career ambitions, build meaningful relationships and develop authentic leadership styles that align with their personal values and visions. By himself and through collaboration with other training and development consulting firms he delivers coaching workshops and trainings aiming at supporting leaders in championing and leading high-performing team.

His personalised coaching approach is designed to deepen self-awareness, build confidence and positive self-image through insightful inquiries and genuine interest in uncovering his client’s unique strengths, skillsets and potentials. Kuswadi’s coachees often describe him as a warm, emphatic, calm and intuitive coach who is skilful in creating safe and self-empowering learning environments. 

Kuswadi is an ICF Associate Certified Coach (ACC), Certified e-Coach by eCoachPro and Certified Professional Coach (CPC) from Institute for Professional Excellence in Coaching (iPEC).

treasury_media.title: Kuswadi Hedeir as a Portrait Photographer
treasury_media.description: When you don’t see me in an intense coaching conversation you would likely find my with my camera in my photo studio taking and making portraits for my clients. People say that my portraits appear painterly to them, check out for yourself and let me know what you think.

treasury_media.title: Kuswadi Hedeir Personal Leadership Coaching
treasury_media.description: Kuswadi Hedeir Personal Leadership Coaching provides professional coaching services to corporate executives and managers. Kuswadi is a Certified Professional Coach graduate from iPEC Coaching, currently based as an expat in The Hague providing his...

profile_positions.description:
Founder of and coach at Kuswadi Hedeir Personal Leadership Coaching (ICF-ACC, iPEC-CPC and iPEC ELI-MP). Provides professional coaching services through partnerships with other coaching and leadership training firms, multinational companies and non-profit organisations. 

 - Coaches individual clients who seek to explore, pursue and live a vision of life and career that are authentically theirs, breaking free from expectation of others and limiting self beliefs. The coaching helps to deepen self awareness and encourage curiosity to investigate assumptions, interpretations and beliefs. It instills sense of responsibility and confidence in one’s own unique skills and abilities. Coachees are equipped with practical tools that they can use outside coaching to align their values and self-image with their goals and purposes. 

 - Delivers tailored, high-touch executive coaching program for high performing mid-career executives and young leaders who seek to develop a leadership style that feels genuine, embraces and builds on their strengths and perceived weaknesses. It helps them to build their presence as a confident and competent leader in their organisations. Clients include new women directors at an International trade and development agency (Europe) and communication and marketing firm (Asia).

 - Developed and delivered team workshop at the communication and public relations international firm in Malaysia. The program consisted of a full-day on-site workshop and coaching sessions. It focused on building deeper understanding and recognition of individual’s diverse styles and preferences with which they process and act on information received. The knowledge gained helped to facilitate high-functioning working relationship between members. 

 - Designs and delivers a unique Coach-Me-First program that aims to give special access to coaching for selected group of people who wouldn’t otherwise have financial means to afford a high-end coaching program.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Personal Leadership Coach

profile_positions.description: Collaborate with VisieScope as one of their esteemed group of trainers with diverse professional background (e.g. musicians, aikido masters, athletes, trained psychologists), delivering highly tailored leadership training programs for their international and regional corporate clients.
profile_positions.title: Trainer and Coach

profile_positions.description:
An Associate Coach and a member of UNLOQ'S (previously eCoachPro) growing pool of international high-end (executive) coaches, Leadership Development (LD) trainers and behavioural scientists. 

Deliver impactful Technology-Enhanced Coaching program (blended face-to-face with online coaching) in creating a continuous development journey (24/7) and accelerate growth in day to day environment. 

Projects: 
Providing coaching sessions to United Nations (UN) volunteers and senior leaders around the globe helping to build their skills, competencies and leadership.
profile_positions.title: Senior Coach, Trainer

profile_positions.description: Owner and photographer at Kuswadi Hedeir Photography, specialising in portraiture photography.
profile_positions.title: Owner and Photographer at Kuswadi Hedeir Photography

profile_positions.description:
A member of the Global Operations Support team in Shell headquarters in The Hague who is responsible for establishing, managing and delivering programme of global performance improvement projects, including the provision of consultancy, coordination and support to projects related to the HR Services organisation. 

The team supports the HR Services global population of c.700 staff. HR Services in turn provide services to all Shell employees and Line Managers, globally numbering over 95,000.
profile_positions.title: Performance Improvement Consultant (HR Services - Global)/Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Staff in scope: 6,000+

Business: Upstream, Production & Technology, and Downstream businesses in Malaysia

Focal point for Shell Malaysia for compensation-related policy and  issues. Ensure alignment of policy implementation, process and decision with Shell Global Pay policy and philosophy. Deliver Shell Malaysia annual pay review process and pay recommendation. Represent Shell Malaysia in Malaysia Oil & Gas Upstream Survey Network. 

Main challenges of the role (i) to understand and take into account diverse level and type of complexity in dealing with different businesses in Malaysia; (ii) stakeholders management (iii) to integrate talent agenda, business strategy and priority in decision making process.
profile_positions.title: Shell Malaysia Compensation Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Staff in scope: 900+ in Malaysia, Australia, New Zealand, China, Philippines and Singapore

Business: Shell EP Asia, Upstream

Responsible for the team maintaining manpower database for Asia Upstream business (900+ staff) and providing manpower data analysis for input into business planning and resourcing discussions. Responsible for recruitment target-setting process and monitor delivery of hires against target for the business. Trained as Graduate and Experienced Hire assessors for Shell and conducted assessment on behalf of the company.

Involved in Shell-wide reorganisation exercise as a member of a small resourcing team managing the exercise for the region (collated job descriptions and uploaded about 800+ job postings into Shell global Open Resource system and coordinated job matching panels). A member of Shell Upstream Regional Diversity & Inclusiveness (D&I) Network and facilitated D&I events and forums and Lunch and Learn sessions.

Managed the 3 Shell Malaysia-EP Business Support Staff manpower services contracts (with total contract value of ~RM10 million).
profile_positions.title: Regional Resourcing Executive, EP Asia

profile_positions.description:
Staff in scope: 900+ in Malaysia, Australia, New Zealand, China, Philippines and Singapore

Business: Shell EP Asia, Upstream 

HR liaison for Regional Discipline Leads/Advisors on talent and resourcing matters. Coordinator for key HR processes namely Progression, Current Estimated Potential review exercise, resourcing process (via Shell’s Open Resource system) and recruitment target setting process and delivery. Supported regional Recruitment organisation in attraction and recruitment activities. Focal point for New Professional’s DEVELOP program focal point for Shell Malaysia graduates in Miri.
profile_positions.title: Regional Talent & Resourcing Coordinator, EP Asia

profile_positions.description:
Production and Operations Geologist for Shell Malaysia-EP oil fields, inboard and deepwater.

Shell Malaysia Upstream

Involved in all stages of field development – exploration, appraisal and production. Built reservoir models, provided Geology input to appraisal and infill drilling campaigns, field development plans, supervised offshore coring operations, co-ordinated appraisal campaign for deepwater field, co-organised regional Shell Geoscience conference, managed geological database, initiated, developed and maintained deepwater field analogue database.
profile_positions.title: Production Geologist

volunteer_experiences.description:
Provides free coaching sessions to unemployed expats living in the Netherlands with average of 1-2 new clients per month and 3-5 hourly sessions per clients. Coachees come from diverse cultural and professional background who are seeking job opportunities and building their careers in the new country. The coaching conversation aims to strengthen their confidence, capitalising on their existing skills, work and life experiences. It includes practical sessions on building robust CV, LinkedIn profile and cover letters as well as job interview preparation and role play.

https://empoweramsterdam.com/our-international-coaches/
